name: Conversion 2
description: If you took damage from an attack since the end of your last turn, you may use a bonus action to change your type to any type that is resistant or immune to the type of move used against you. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.

effect.name: Works well if it is the same type as the move used by the last Pok√©mon.
effect.effect: 4 Appeal points if the move used immediately before it was the same contest type, 2 Appeal points if not.
